channel.title: Supported Captchas on Harvester
channel.description: Recent content in Supported Captchas on Harvester

item.title: ReCaptcha v2
item.description: ReCaptcha v2 Example # This guide shows how to setup the harvester to collect tokens for Google’s ReCaptcha v2. from harvester import Harvester, ReCaptchaV2 captcha = ReCaptchaV2( url='www.supremenewyork.com', sitekey='6LeWwRkUAAAAAOBsau7KpuC9AV-6J8mhw4AjC3Xz' ) harvester = Harvester().serveforever() intercepter = harvester.capture(captcha) Next, take a look at configuring the browser and getting to the actual harvesting of the captcha tokens here

item.title: ReCaptcha v3
item.description: ReCaptcha v3 Example # This guide shows how to setup the harvester to collect tokens for Google’s ReCaptcha v3. from harvester import Harvester, ReCaptchaV3 captcha = ReCaptchaV3( url='https://recaptcha-demo.appspot.com/recaptcha-v3-request-scores.php', sitekey='6LdyC2cUAAAAACGuDKpXeDorzUDWXmdqeg-xy696', action='examples/v3scores' ) harvester = Harvester().serveforever() intercepter = harvester.capture(captcha) Next, take a look at configuring the browser and getting to the actual harvesting of the captcha tokens here

item.title: hCaptcha
item.description: hCaptchas Example # This guide shows how to setup the harvester to collect tokens for hCaptchas. from harvester import Harvester, hCaptcha captcha = hCaptcha( url='www.sotostore.com', sitekey='33f96e6a-38cd-421b-bb68-7806e1764460' ) harvester = Harvester().serveforever() intercepter = harvester.capture(captcha) Next, take a look at configuring the browser and getting to the actual harvesting of the captcha tokens here
